column1: It’s been 8 months since we passed a COVID bill. Since then the virus has worsened & many Floridians have lost their jobs. If Congress can’t put partisanship & political posturing aside to help families & businesses in need we will have fundamentally failed the American people. https://t.co/e78poJbDWR

This administration must allow the transition process to start immediately. That means ensuring the President-elect is receiving intelligence briefings and that government agencies are beginning to hand off the coronavirus pandemic response. https://t.co/NFRETYybQE

Next Congress we must unite our caucus to address COVID and get our economy back on track. We also need an agenda & message that expands our Democratic majority. @RepCicilline has the experience & vision to do it as Assistant Speaker and he has my full support!

NEWS: As a result of Hurricane Irma @fema has announced they’re reimbursing @OrangeCoFL more than $3.5M for money spent on debris removal. These funds can now be used to help our community respond to the ongoing threat posed by COVID-19. #FL07 #FlaPol

And this new COVID relief package should also include my bipartisan “clean start” tax credit with @RepLaHood. Businesses need our help. This bill would assist them in buying cleaning supplies and hiring cleaners to keep their workplaces safe for employees and customers.

As COVID cases rise & layoffs continue Congress must pass another COVID relief bill ASAP. Central Florida workers are desperate for additional support. We need another round of checks & job saving measures like my expanded employee retention tax credit. No more delay.

The pandemic has not ended. We are seeing a steady rise in COVID cases and deaths that require each of us to do our part to contain this deadly virus. That includes mask wearing and social distancing. If we tune out the politics and follow the science we can beat this. https://t.co/so9E5xFAoP

Always great to meet w/ my Youth Advisory Board (albeit virtually this time). We discussed the COVID-19 crisis and the steps we must take to keep #FL07 students and our community safe. Thank you to @FFCongress Vice Chair @RepJimmyGomez for being our special guest today! #FlaPol https://t.co/x2deBgiGNh

A good government is an effective government. Right now both parties in Congress and the President are failing the test. We must quickly reach a bipartisan deal on another COVID relief bill that helps families workers and businesses endure and overcome this crisis. https://t.co/hOjaJGlhix

No teacher in America should have to purchase these critical supplies with their hard-earned money in order to keep their students and themselves safe. I’ll keep urging congressional leaders to enact another COVID relief bill that supports students teachers and schools. #FlaPol

.@HouseBlueDogs & I told the Speaker we must pass a COVID bill that “will contain provisions we as Democrats do not like and omit provisions we want. But our country is in crisis and we must not let the perfect become the enemy of the good." #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/M5hB0gQTGU

Time is of the essence. Congressional leaders & the President must set partisan politics aside & swiftly negotiate another bipartisan COVID relief bill. Otherwise American families workers and businesses will be left hanging at the precise time they most need a helping hand. https://t.co/Q9jnu4XnO3

Happy #LaborDay! 🇺🇸 Today we celebrate all the hardworking men and women that have contributed to this nation & I’m especially grateful to those out on the frontlines of the COVID-19 pandemic. Thank you for your efforts to save lives & keep us all safe. https://t.co/NxE6q898FK

.@RepJohnKatko & I lead a bipartisan series focused on national security in the shadow of COVID-19. This week our guest was Michael Leiter ex-director of the National Counterterrorism Center who stressed how critical it is to work across party lines to keep our nation safe. https://t.co/TIocR3WwZL

I led a coalition that called on Congressional leaders to restart COVID relief talks & negotiate a principled compromise w/the White House that includes bipartisan priorities. We can’t allow politics to get in the way of helping those who desperately need our help. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/zcBFbq5KIC

Today I led a coalition urging Speaker Pelosi & Senator McConnell to immediately resume negotiations on COVID relief. Too many families and small businesses are suffering and they shouldn't suffer more because of partisan politics. #FL07 #FlaPol   Here's what I'm fighting for: https://t.co/dXyA5ryY02

Florida is breaking daily COVID records. We’re calling on FL leaders to take aggressive action to curb the spread of the virus. If they don’t more Floridians will die and our economy won’t be able to re-open and recover. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/fOL1ieK0AU

This cynical effort by the Trump Administration is an attempt to distract from its own failure to control the spread of COVID-19 in America. It’s also a damaging move that compromises the global effort to combat this global pandemic. We’re all in this together. https://t.co/M56ajO1UwD

My bill would require the Director of National Intelligence to prepare an assessment for Congress and the American public of the different ways the Chinese government is exploiting COVID-19. Once we identify these tactics we need to combat them in a smart and strategic way.
NEWS: @FLSERT is receiving $25M+ from @fema to fund COVID-19 testing sites across the state & provide Floridians with PPE and other medical supplies during this pandemic.

HOY: Únase a nuestra charla por Facebook Live a las 3 p.m. sobre el coronavirus y los beneficios disponibles para usted y su familia. Mande sus preguntas aquí: https://t.co/DUlLKmEvu9.  Mírelo en vivo: https://t.co/UDvN9RbLdK #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/DGLRipwQJt

Únase a nuestra charla por Facebook Live este próximo lunes sobre el coronavirus y los beneficios disponibles para usted y su familia . Mande sus preguntas aquí: https://t.co/DUlLKmEvu9 #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/recY49wEKW

¿Tiene preguntas sobre el coronavirus o los beneficios estatales y federales para los que califica durante esta crisis? Únase a nuestra charla por Facebook Live este próximo lunes. Mande sus preguntas aquí: https://t.co/DUlLKmEvu9 #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/Uj18W3vojH

We are facing unique challenges this hurricane season due to #COVID19. Tune in on June 8th at noon for a hurricane preparedness webinar. I’ll be joined by forecast experts & emergency management officials. SUBMIT YOUR QUESTIONS ⬇️ https://t.co/Uk6CTCFQiv #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/P9hfleQd3t

Hispanic communities in Central Florida have been disproportionally affected by the coronavirus. I’m hosting this town hall in Spanish to give them answers in their preferred language. Help us spread the word: https://t.co/DUlLKmEvu9. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/nPRt0jR66W https://t.co/Ncl1iXYcYJ

Las comunidades hispanas en la Florida Central se han visto desproporcionadamente afectadas por el coronavirus. Estoy organizando este evento en español para darles la oportunidad de obtener respuestas en su idioma preferido. Regístrate: https://t.co/DUlLKmEvu9 #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/anBgDF8caS

The Chinese government misled the world about COVID-19 and manipulated data accelerating this pandemic. Now the Chinese Communist Party wants to expand authoritarian control of the region. Both are viruses that must be contained. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/g3jUvwj1lx

To help workers & businesses hurt by COVID-19 we need ideas that are big bold AND bipartisan—like our bill to enhance the employee retention tax credit. We got it thru the House & now we’re working with the President & Senate to get it into law. #FlaPol https://t.co/uK35efPRDm

COVID-19 didn’t break our state’s unemployment program. It exposed a broken system that had long been denying workers the economic support they need. We’ll continue helping Floridians seeking unemployment benefits & pushing the state to do much better. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/Y1dDGxRLhc

Pleased @GovRonDeSantis requested the $20M Congress provided to safeguard the 2020 election during the #COVID19 pandemic as @MarioDB and I urged in a bipartisan letter. This money should be used to facilitate vote-by-mail and to ensure every vote counts. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/LvRRywGTi3

Thank you Pastor Octavius Smith for inviting me to join Allen Chapel AME Church's weekly prayer call to pray for the people of #Sanford & update your congregation on the COVID response. I look forward to visiting your church again in person very soon! God bless you #FL07 #FlaPol

FL is regarded as the fishing capital of the world but our fishing industry has been hit hard by #COVID19 & that's had a ripple effect on our economy. In April I urged @SecretaryRoss to quickly release aid the #CARESAct provided fisherman & I welcome this news. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/uka9dm8txu

With just about 100 days before the next FL primary @MarioDB & I are leading a bipartisan letter today urging @GovRonDeSantis to formally request funds provided in the CARES Act to make elections in FL safer during #COVID19. #FlaPol #FL07  More ➡️ https://t.co/4j3oPaAm5V https://t.co/0UYndBcOox

Democrats and Republicans in Congress working with the Trump administration have already managed to put politics aside and pass four bills to mitigate the health and economic effects of COVID-19. This bipartisan proposal should be the next step. #FlaPol #FL07

THREAD: Just introduced a bipartisan bill with @RepJohnKatko @RepDelBene @RepBrianFitz & @RepChrisPappas to reduce layoffs by expanding the Employee Retention Tax Credit (#ERTC). We'll be looking to make this a part of the next COVID-19 relief bill.⬇️   https://t.co/IItBxfpbSM

Join our discussion with @csis_isp & @CSISHealth at 11 a.m. on my bipartisan proposal with @RepJohnKatko to set up a 9/11-style commission that will examine our response to #COVID19 & future pandemics. Details below ⬇️ #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/GXkImuzoVw

IRS just updated its guidance on the employee retention tax credit. I led the bipartisan effort to get ERTC in the CARES Act & am working to expand it in the next COVID bill. ERTC encourages businesses to keep workers on payroll during the crisis. #FlaPol  https://t.co/ZsKUViqjMJ
#COVID19 TESTING UPDATE: Mobile testing at Barnett Park cancelled tomorrow. More details below. #FL07 #FlaPol https://t.co/JpKZUYJamU

Wearing a cloth face covering CORRECTLY can help prevent the spread of #COVID19. When you go out on essential trips follow these tips. If you have a child remember those under age 2 should not wear a face covering. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/khblx1c7D1

We need public infrastructure investments now more than ever especially in our medical facilities. We have the opportunity to put hundreds of thousands of workers like @GoIUPAT members back to work to help our nation recover from #COVID19. https://t.co/FOYcwI8xRS

Incredibly proud of Hannah and Arjun Lake Mary students who started a non-profit to collect old tablets and phones to help seniors access telehealth during #COVID19. Check out their work below ⬇️. #FL07 #FlaPol  https://t.co/DKVdkUxVny
#COVID19 TESTING UPDATE: Due to weather testing scheduled from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. today at Journeys Academy in #Sanford has been cancelled. #FlaPol #FL07

Let me say one thing. I’m glad this latest #COVID19 bill passed but I’m sick & tired of the political games. Congress should always put people over politics—especially during a national crisis.  Both sides are to blame for the delays we’ve seen & it’s gotta stop. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/XroJhyWmyU

FYI - @ncsinformation & the modeling simulation & training (MS&T) industry have launched a scholarship campaign for students impacted by COVID-19. Details below ⬇️. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/8BTt484rSZ
#COVID19 test sites in @seminolecounty ⬇️ #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/agYwUm93Zg

It is critical that we continue to produce more #COVID19 tests and ensure they are made widely available as soon as possible. I'm glad to hear that FDA has just approved the first at-home test which holds promise to help us overcome this pandemic. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/G07y8MN6we

Uninsured Floridians are being charged for #COVID19 testing. Congress gave governors the power to cover testing for the uninsured through Medicaid with the fed. government paying 100%. Even states like TX are doing it. But our governor refuses. This is unacceptable. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/ih8uD6AvFj
GREAT NEWS! Happy to hear Sgt. Green has recovered from #COVID19. Thankful for those on the frontlines during this public health crisis. https://t.co/6luXZygeoj

President Trump has asked me to help guide our nation’s economic recovery from the #COVID19 crisis. I’ll work with both parties to ensure our country emerges from this pandemic with an economy that is stronger & more resilient. #FL07 #FlaPol https://t.co/iWBEOEUWzO

THREAD: While I disagree w/@POTUS on a vast array of issues my job is to put politics aside & advocate for my constituents. So when @POTUS asked me to help guide our nation’s economic recovery from the COVID-19 crisis I wanted to make sure CFL had a seat at the table. #FlaPol https://t.co/Y7W7LoGWuF
REMINDER: April 15th is traditionally #TaxDay but due to the #COVID19 outbreak you now have until July 15th to file. More info below ⬇️ #FlaPol #FL07  https://t.co/ub8ThzGm3P

In total about 100 airports in FL will receive nearly $900M under the CARES Act including $170M for @MCO. This funding will help FL’s airports endure the unprecedented economic crisis posed by COVID-19 & will save the jobs of many airport employees. #FlaPol #FL07 2/2

NEWS: @SFB_Airport will receive nearly $23M from FAA to maintain operations continue improvement projects & keep airport workers employed. The funding is a result of bipartisan work in Congress to provide relief in response to #COVID19. #FlaPol #FL07 1/2 https://t.co/CJqFyu7Tlm

At least 10 TSA officers at @MCO have tested positive for #COVID19 potentially exposing other aviation workers & travelers. Led a letter with @RepValDemings & @RepDarrenSoto calling on @TSA to take steps to safeguard the health of these officers. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/SBLghtkjIf
JUST IN: @HHSGov is awarding @FLHospitalAssn over $2.8 million to help hospitals in our state prepare for and respond to #COVID19 and other health emergencies.  #FL07 #FlaPol

History will judge us on whether our actions were effective not whether our intentions were noble. Only results matter. To save the country we love we must fight this fire with everything we've got. Read my Op-Ed on CNN ⬇️  #FlaPol #FL07 #COVID19 https://t.co/rCbQi9I0Wh

Despite significant federal support FL’s unemployment program has collapsed when it's needed most causing incalculable harm to Floridians during the #COVID19 crisis. I'm calling on @DOLOIG to conduct an independent investigation ⬇️. #FlaPol #FL07 1/3  https://t.co/KDUJmQmq9u

NEWS: FL will receive 2.2B to help health providers combat #COVID19. This is 1 of 3 upcoming payments from $100B passed by Congress. I’m working to ensure the distribution formula is fair to all FL hospitals including those who treat many Medicare Advantage patients. #FlaPol https://t.co/Df9ocbSm1B

THIS JUST IN: As a result of Hurricane Michael @fema today reimbursed @FLSERT $42.5M for money spent on emergency protective measures. These funds can now help Florida respond to a new threat #COVID19. @MyFDOT also getting $20.5M for money spent on debris removal. #FL07 #FlaPol

Regardless of income level or insurance coverage community health centers like @TrueHealthFL are a vital resource in helping treat patients in need. Learn more about how this funding will help prevent diagnose & treat #COVID19 in CFL. ⬇️#FlaPol #FL07  https://t.co/c0hWQUg3PC

This federal funding will help @TrueHealthFL sustain & strengthen operations as they care for patients affected by the #COVID19 pandemic. I’ll keep fighting to bring home the resources Central Florida needs to ensure our community stays healthy & safe during this crisis. #FlaPol https://t.co/zcsiOUW4M7
Looking for a way to help during the #COVID19 crisis? Donate blood outside of the #Orlando City Hall TODAY from 9am to 3pm. ⬇️  #FL07 #FlaPol https://t.co/8ztYbrUgrg

Enjoyed chatting with @alexisohanian yesterday about #COVID19 response efforts to help families & workers access paid sick & family leave during this time. Congress took a step in the right direction but it’s clear more has to be done to help more families & workers in need. https://t.co/IE1oDfborN

TODAY: I’ll be joining fellow Floridian @AlexisOhanian in a live Q&A about the #COVID19 crisis at 3:45pm ET.   What questions do you have for us? Tune in via IG Live (https://t.co/YUWDBl0EbD) to submit them! #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/IAhNTlpSlz

NEWS: @OrlandoPolice & @OrlandoFireDept could run out of #COVID19 protective gear as soon as next week. @RepDarrenSoto & I are calling on @GovRonDeSantis to immediately provide our first responders with the PPE they need to keep themselves & others safe. #FlaPol #FL07 #Sayfie https://t.co/LZmBtx16HH

TOMORROW: I'll be joining @reddit & @Initialized co-founder @alexisohanian for an Instagram Live chat on #COVID19. Make sure you follow me on Instagram (@RepStephMurphy) and tune in at 3:45 ET for our discussion. Looking forward to your questions! #FlaPol https://t.co/JcH3fsGxlE

THIS JUST IN: As a result of Hurricane Michael @fema today reimbursed @FLSERT $34 million for money spent on emergency protective measures & @MyFDOT $9.3 million for money spent on debris removal. These funds can now help Florida respond to a new threat #COVID19. #FL07 #FlaPol

Right now we must all be laser-focused on the immediate threat posed by #COVID-19. But we do need a bipartisan comprehensive review of our response when we emerge from this crisis. What did we learn? What did we do wrong? What did we do right? https://t.co/6d4fgeIG4P

NEWS: I've introduced a bipartisan bill with @RepJohnKatko to establish a 9/11-style commission that would examine U.S. preparation for & response to #COVIDー19 & recommend concrete actions for U.S. to better prepare for future pandemics. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/6d4fgeIG4P https://t.co/di7NILeNu6

To all the other parents out there who are #WFH with young kids and struggling to explain what's happening I SEE YOU. @WUCFTV has put out some fun "Meet the Helpers" videos to teach kids about #COVID19 and important community helpers. https://t.co/tJEV7YCM2g

As we face this #COVID19 pandemic our brave & dedicated health care professionals are on the frontlines helping us fight back & save lives. Today is #NationalDoctorsDay so I want to thank them and everyone in our health care system for what you do. You have my full support.

In accordance w/CDC I ended my self quarantine this weekend 2 weeks after my exposure to a colleague who had #COVID19. I’ve been asymptomatic & in good health throughout. Thank you for your well wishes! I’ll keep practicing social distancing as CDC says ALL Americans should do.

I know many central Florida families have questions about #COVID19 and the federal government’s response to this public health crisis. I’m hosting a telephone town hall on Monday to get you the information you need and to listen to you. Hope you can join us. #FlaPol #FL07 https://t.co/B5zKX1ldQz

BREAKING: President Trump has signed our bipartisan legislation to combat the public health & economic crisis caused by #COVID19. The bill provides American families & small business owners with direct financial support to put food on the table & keep their businesses afloat. 1/2

What I've heard from health care workers is heartbreaking. We're sending them into battle w/out adequate equipment to protect themselves & others. Glad the House will soon pass a bipartisan bill that will provide much-needed resources to aid in our fight against #COVID19 #FlaPol https://t.co/2oa3BRrqQV

The House will soon pass a #COVID19 relief bill that will get much needed money into the hands of millions of Americans. Have questions about how the relief bill will impact your family? Join me for a telephone townhall Monday @ 7:15pm. Details: https://t.co/C6VGJSmAsm  #FlaPol https://t.co/mf8uhfxZwf

Pleased my ERTC proposal was included in the coronavirus bill that will soon become law. It’s estimated it will provide $55 billion in support to businesses who pay their employees rather than lay them off.
